oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Military uniforms
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1865; Bragg, Braxtion, 1817-1876
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bust portrait of young General Braxton Bragg in uniform.

Bragg was born in North Carolina in 1817. He served in the Second Seminole War in Florida and the Mexican-American War. During the U.S. Civil War, Bragg commanded the Confederate Army of Mississippi and Army of Tennessee. He operated in a command capacity during the battles of Shiloh, Stones River, Chickmauga, and Chattanooga among others. He died in Texas in 1876.
